body: If we switch from pipe syntax to JS syntax for function calls, then I think we should make floordiv a function that can be called, instead of an operator. That way, we stick close to JS syntax.
body_text: If we switch from pipe syntax to JS syntax for function calls, then I think we should make floordiv a function that can be called, instead of an operator. That way, we stick close to JS syntax.
